text: St. Peter's (Scottish Gaelic: Baile Pheadair; formerly known as "Santo Pedro", "Saint-Pierre", "Port Toulouse", and "St. Peters") is a small incorporated village located on Cape Breton Island in Richmond County, Nova Scotia, Canada. ==Other websites== * Official Web Site * St. Peters Canal National Historic Site * St. Peters Lions Club Marina * Wallace MacAskill Yacht Club Category:Villages in Nova Scotia
title: St. Peter's, Nova Scotia
